name: K-Playtime
description: Know how long you've played on a server, and when you first joined
author: Kodi

authorized-users.description: People who can create and remove commands.

commands.name: !playtime
commands.description: See your or others total playtime. If the name has a space, replace it with a _

commands.name: !firstjoin
commands.description: See when you or others first joined the server. If the name has a space, replace it with a _

commands.name: !plytime:clearstore
commands.description: Clears store, which is all saved times. Do not do unless required. Requires Authorization.
